QuestData.Title: The Kaliri Whisperer
QuestData.Description: An important contact lives in the nearby Shadowglade. He is meek, but trains kaliri of monstrous size which are quite dangerous.$B$BHe once claimed they could knock a rylak out of the sky, but I'll believe that when I see it.$B$BSkizzik is holding a valuable treasure for me. Seek him out and get him back to Veil Terokk if you can. At the very least, recover the gavel I entrusted to him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover the Old Gavel from Skizzik.
QuestData.RewardText: I see. Well, at least the gavel is safe.$B$BAs you may have guessed, it is another of the Talon King's relics.
